introduction: Founded in 2018 and based in the Cayman Islands, Ledn offers Bitcoin-backed loans. Borrower collateral sits in cold, insured vaults at BitGo Trust Company, and the platform backs its controls with a SOC 2 Type II attestation and semi-annual proof-of-reserves.
highlights: Ledn's Custodied Loans score well for CeFi: borrower BTC stays segregated in BitGo's cold, insured vaults, and the firm has survived the bankruptcy wave that sank early Bitcoin lenders during 2022-23 while maintaining a long-running incident-free record. Improvement areas remain: liquidations still rely on a single undisclosed price feed, and Ledn's cold-to-hot wallet operations lack an independent audit.

rehypothecation.note: Collateral may be re-posted once to one institutional USD funding partner; on-chain segregation claimed and partner barred from onward rehypothecation, but the borrower has no direct contractual recourse if Ledn's partner violates the restriction.

custody.note: Ledn parks borrower BTC at BitGo Trust Company, a regulated, insured qualified custodian. BitGo keeps keys offline in cold-storage vaults and runs segregated, bankruptcy-remote accounts. Ledn states collateral is "never commingled" with other assets and is held in segregated on-chain addresses ring-fenced from any funding-partner bankruptcy.

security_governance.note: Achieved SOC 2 Type II on 10 Sep 2024 and stores client BTC with BitGo Trust, a SOC-2-audited qualified custodian. Help-centre states assets in Transaction accounts are "primarily held in cold storage", implying only a small operational hot wallet outside the audit scope. Ledn's own cold-to-hot workflow is merely self-described and not independently audited.

oracle.note: Ledn fully controls the oracle, with no public disclosure of its design or data sources.

liquidation_buffer.note: Ledn provides a 30% liquidation buffer (50% â†’ 80% LTV), sends automated notifications at 70% and 75%, but has no margin call system. Borrowers are not required to act, and liquidation is triggered automatically and immediately once the liquidation threshold (80% LTV) is breached, with no contractual grace window.

rate_and_term.note: Fixed 12-month coupon; funding stack opaque but rate cannot float mid-term.

transparency.note: Publishes CPA-attested Proof-of-Reserves twice a year; backend code closed-source.

loan_currency.note: Top-tier fiat stable (USDC) or USD wire.

history.note: Clean record since 2018 but limited OSS/audits.
